Level 29
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 29
By Y.K.TAN on Wednesday, May 15, 2002 - 12:44 am:

level 29

At the start of the stage,jump down the gap on your left,and go left to get the key,FAST. By the time after that,the naga's wil be coming,destroy all the boxes so that the naga's will fall into the holes,getting stuck. Go to the right end of the stage and create box to form a bridge up to the max,and using the bridge form it across the screen with the metal blocks,at the same time destroying the bridge,as the naga's will fall on the bridge through the gap. Form the bridge till to the left,and when the naga fall through the gap,quickly make your way up,and right and get out of the stage.
